scripts.network: hc s clean && pnpm build:happ && BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "pnpm -F @holochain-open-dev/cancellations start " "pnpm local-services" "npm run launch" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: nix flake check -L && pnpm run build:happ && pnpm -F tests test
scripts.launch: echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/cancellations.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT
